beer.beer_description:
Meantime brewmaster, Alastair Hook, has spent 20 years planning the quintessential English lager. His reasoning is simple.The great European lager brewers use very soft water and neutral yeasts to ensure that only the flavours of their locally grown malt and hops come to the fore. East Anglia is home to the world's finest malting barley and Kent is home to some of the world's best hops. Midway between the two, London is ideally placed to bring them together in a straightforward, clean, long-matured, unpasteurised lager, where all you can taste is malt and hop.

Formally known as London Lager.

That's a beer at 5 different Music Venues! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 2!

items.badge_description: It’s been a long week and you deserve a drink, or five. Besides, isn’t that what your check is for?

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 25 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 6!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 20 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.checkin_comment: Je kunt er doorheen kijken…. met recht een echte Londense lager.

user.bio: Ik heb medelijden met mensen die niet drinken; Ze voelen zich 's morgens, overdag en 's avonds altijd hetzelfde. Cheers!
⭐️ Kan hier een positief verhaal over mezelf schrijven, maar ik heb al bier op dus wie gelooft het?

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 215 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 44!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 170 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 35.

items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 25 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.checkin_comment: Enjoying this one by a body of water called the Thames river. Behind me is the bridge of the Tower. Beer was decent. Very easygoing. Need to pee and poo badly. Soon Arsenal
